nodes.text: The C-B7 Interceptor was an opulent landspeeder manufactured by Arlen-Dempler Luxury Speeders.

The C-B7 Interceptor was a two-door model of speeder able to accommodate four passengers in addition to a single driver. It came equipped with a sophisticated entertainment system, as well as a top-of-the-line drive system, comfort and safety features. In spite of its luxury accoutrements, the Interceptor was simple to maintain and highly modifiable. This made it a popular choice for intelligence agencies and their operatives working on affluent worlds.
